languages.text: Старая Ризза еще долго возглавляла круг капитанов братства. На склоне лет она вновь вернулась на боевой мостик и возглавила беспрецедентную по дерзости атаку на материнскую эскадру флота Осознание, в ходе которой была захвачена дюжина транспортов, груженных священными дарами Омниссии.
languages.translation_comment: Риззу не корраптили и не ридимили

languages.text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.
languages.original_text: Старая Ризза еще долго возглавляла круг капитанов братства. На склоне лет она вновь вернулась на боевой мостик и возглавила беспрецедентную по дерзости атаку на материнскую эскадру флота Осознание, в ходе которой была захвачена дюжина транспортов, груженных священными дарами Омниссии.

traits.locale_text: Old Ryzza for many years, presided over the circle of the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm on a captain's bridge, and led the unprecedented in its audacity attack on a mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with sacred sacraments to the Omnissiah.

Old Ryzza for many years, presided over the circle of the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm on a captain's bridge, and led the unprecedented in its audacity attack on a mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with sacred sacraments to the Omnissiah.

For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with sacred sacraments to the Omnissiah.

For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with sacred sacraments to the Omnissiah.

For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

languages.text: 接下来的许多年，老莱萨一直领导着虚空协联的众多海盗舰长。在她生命的最后时刻，她再次亲自掌舵，领导了一场前所未有的劫掠，袭击了真理开拓者舰队的母舰队。在这场袭击中，海盗们成功夺取了十几艘运输船，船上装满了欧姆尼塞亚的神圣礼物。
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: 接下来的许多年，老莱萨一直领导着虚空协联的众多海盗舰长。在她生命的最后时刻，她再次亲自掌舵，领导了一场前所未有的劫掠，袭击了真理开拓者舰队的母舰队。在这场袭击中，海盗们成功夺取了十几艘运输船，船上装满了献给欧姆尼塞亚的神圣造物。

languages.text: Viele Jahre lang stand die alte Ryzza den Captains der Gefährten vor. Am Ende ihres Lebens übernahm sie noch einmal das Ruder eines Schiffs und führte einen noch nie da gewesenen Angriff auf das Muttergeschwader der Erkenntnisflotte aus. Dabei gelang es den Angreifern, ein Dutzend Transportschiffe voller heiliger Gaben des Omnissiah zu erobern.
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: Viele Jahre lang stand die alte Ryzza den Captains der Gefährten vor. Am Ende ihres Lebens übernahm sie noch einmal das Ruder eines Schiffs und führte einen noch nie da gewesenen Angriff auf das Muttergeschwader der Erkenntnisflotte aus, bei dem es den Angreifern gelang, ein Dutzend Transportschiffe voller heiliger Sakramente des Omnissiah zu erobern.

languages.text: La vieille Ryzza resta à la tête des capitaines de la Communauté de longues années durant. Vers la fin de sa vie, elle prit la barre d'un vaisseau afin de mener une attaque sans précédent contre l'escadron principal de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Durant la bataille, les attaquants parvinrent à s'emparer d'une douzaine de vaisseaux transportant des dons sacrés de l'Omnimessie.
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: La vieille Ryzza resta à la tête des capitaines de la Communauté durant de longues années. Vers la fin de sa vie, elle prit la barre d'un vaisseau afin de mener une attaque sans précédent contre l'escadron principal de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Durant la bataille, les attaquants parvinrent à s'emparer d'une douzaine de vaisseaux transportant des sacrements destinés à l'Omnimessie.

languages.text: Durante años, la vieja Ryzza lideró a los capitanes de la Hermandad. En el crepúsculo de su vida, tomó de nuevo el timón de una nave y dirigió un ataque sin precedentes contra el escuadrón madre de la Flota Conciencia durante el que los atacantes lograron hacerse con una decena de naves de transporte cargadas de tesoros sagrados del Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: Durante años, la vieja Ryzza lideró a los capitanes de la Hermandad. En el crepúsculo de su vida, tomó de nuevo el timón de una nave y dirigió un ataque sin precedentes contra el escuadrón madre de la Flota Conciencia durante el que los atacantes lograron hacerse con una decena de naves de transporte cargadas de sacramentos dedicados al Omnissiah.

languages.text: 老いたリザは長年にわたり、虚空の仲間であり、かつ船長たちの統率者であり続けた。晩年にはふたたび一隻の船の長となり、コグニサンス艦隊の母戦隊に対するかつてないほどの大攻勢を先導した。その間に、攻撃者たちは輸送船団の収奪に成功し、積まれていた万機神への神聖な贈り物を入手したのだ。
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: 老いたリザは長年にわたり、虚空の仲間であり、かつ船長たちの統率者であり続けた。晩年にはふたたび一隻の船の長となり、コグニサンス艦隊の母戦隊に対するかつてないほどの大攻勢を先導した。その間に、攻撃者たちは輸送船団の収奪に成功し、積まれていた万機神への神聖な贈り物を入手したのだ。

languages.text: Koca Ryzza, yıllar boyunca Kardeşlik kaptanlarının başında kaldı. Yaşamının son anlarında bir kez daha gemi dümenine geçti ve Malumat Filosu'nun ana eskadrasına emsali görülmemiş bir saldırı düzenledi. Saldırı sırasında Hermesih'in kutsal armağanlarıyla yüklü, çok sayıda nakliye gemisine el koymayı başardı.
languages.original_text: For many years, old Ryzza presided over the captains of the Fellowship. At the end of her life, she once again took the helm of a ship and led an unprecedented attack on the mother squadron of the Cognisance Fleet, during which the attackers managed to seize a dozen transport ships loaded with the Omnissiah's sacred gifts.

traits.locale_text: Kardeşlik kaptanları yıllar boyunca koca Ryzza tarafından yönetildi. Yaşamının son anlarında bir kez daha bir geminin dümenine geçti ve Malumat Filosu'nun ana eskadrasına emsali görülmemiş bir saldırı düzenledi. Saldırı sırasında Hermesih'in kutsal armağanlarıyla yüklü bir düzine nakliye gemisine de el koymayı başardı.

languages.translation_comment: Риззу не корраптили и не ридимили
